pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fuzzy Logic Toolkit for R // Design and simulate fuzzy logic systems using Type-1 and Interval Type-2 Fuzzy Logic. This toolkit includes with graphical user interface (GUI) and an adaptive neuro- fuzzy inference system (ANFIS). This toolkit is a continuation from the previous package ('FuzzyToolkitUoN'). Produced by the Intelligent Modelling Analysis Group (IMA) and Lab for UnCertainty In Data and decision making (LUCID), University of Nottingham.
